achievements: Authored the influential ten-volume history 'History of the United States'
Served as Secretary of the Navy under Presidents Andrew Jackson and Martin Van Buren
Founded the Naval Academy in Annapolis
Won an Academy Award for Best Actress for her role in 'The Miracle Worker'
Nominated for four other Oscars and won a Tony Award for her Broadway performance in the same play
Starred in films like 'Graduate' and 'To Be or Not To Be'
